text:
Using Xindice's HTTP interface, XML is returned in platform default encoding,  
but XML encoding attribute is not set in XML header. 
 
Have fix, will probably commit it to CVS.

Can you write a test for this problem?  I don't know how you could test that,
maybe with Cactus but since we are supporting the servlet interface it would be
nice to have tests for it.
